p:
The oil yield obtained with extraction using subcritical propane was around 28.3%. Table 5 (
29 ) shows fixed and variable costs, as well as oil total cost per litre. Fixed oil unit production cost was around US$ 56 540.00 and plant age was approx. 10 years. The total oil cost per litre is high when produced in a laboratory scale unit, as it yields small quantities of linseed oil (0.48 L/day).
